We want to put the largest digit in the highest place value. 

Which digit is the largest?

$\maroonD5$ is the largest digit, and we want to put it in the position with the highest place value.   

So $\maroonD5$ will be in the hundreds place: 
 $\maroonD{5}~\_~\_$.

Now we need to do the same thing with the next largest digit:  $\blueE3$.  

So $\blueE3$ goes in the tens place:  

$\maroonD{5}~\blueE3~\_$

The smallest digit is the $\purpleD1$.  The  $\purpleD1$ goes in the ones place:  

$\maroonD{5}\blueE3\purpleD1$
The greatest possible number we can make is $\maroonD{5}\blueE3\purpleD1$.
